text:
Any idea why I can’t use `cholfact` ?
<http://web.mit.edu/julia_v0.6.2/julia/share/doc/julia/html/en/stdlib/linalg.html#Base.LinAlg.cholfact>
```julia> using LinearAlgebra

julia> cholfact
ERROR: UndefVarError: cholfact not defined```
version info
```Julia Version 1.5.3

Platform Info:
  OS: macOS (x86_64-apple-darwin18.7.0)

  WORD_SIZE: 64
  LIBM: libopenlibm
  LLVM: libLLVM-9.0.1 (ORCJIT, haswell)```
